CustomField.description: if custom "Parent BUs" are created, shared DataExtensions still live on the real ParentBU. To manage 1:n deployments of these, we want to get environment variables from the country/market BUs and not from these custom "Parent BUs". Please note that in such a scenario one would create multiple environments for the same EID/MID, 1 for match each custom "Parent BU"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If activated, it is tried to retrieve Child Environment Variables not from direct children but from the children of the 1 child that this BU has. Only required if you have custom "Parent BUs" created for your DEV/QA/PROD setup and did not use the actual ParentBU for integrations.
CustomField.label: Is Enterprise BU
